name: Yagnoloth
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 16

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The yagnoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), suggestion
* 3/day: lightning bolt

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The yagnoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The yagnoloth's weapon attacks are magical.
